statements: UPDATE water_demand_forecast SET usage_pattern = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE water_demand_forecast SET population_growth = 5, usage_pattern = 80 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE water_demand_forecast SET population_growth = 500, usage_pattern = 2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE water_demand_forecast SET usage_pattern = 3, population_growth = 600 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE water_demand_forecast SET population_growth = 2.5, company_id = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE population_data SET population = 50000 WHERE region = 'New York' AND year = 2023;
UPDATE water_demand_forecast SET usage_pattern = '{"daily": [20, 30, 25, 40], "weekly": [150, 200, 180]}', population_growth = 0.05 WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE population_data SET population = 150000, region = 'East' WHERE year = 2021;
UPDATE WaterDemandForecast SET usage_volume = 500 WHERE location_id = 1
UPDATE PopulationGrowth SET population_count = 10000, year = 2022 WHERE location_id = 1
UPDATE WaterDemandForecast SET usage_volume = 150 WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE PopulationGrowth SET population_count = 50000, year = 2021 WHERE location_id = 3;
UPDATE Customer SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', address = '123 Main St', city = 'Springfield', state = 'IL', postal_code = '12345' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE WaterMeter SET installation_date = '2022-01-15', location = '456 Elm St', manufacturer = 'ABC Company', model = '123A', serial_number = '987654' WHERE meter_id = 1;
UPDATE Customer SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', address = '123 Main St', city = 'Springfield' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE WaterMeter SET location = 'Backyard', manufacturer = 'AquaTech', model = 'X2000', serial_number = 'ABC123' WHERE meter_id = 3;
UPDATE Users SET email = 'user1@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE WaterUsage SET gallons_used = 500 WHERE usage_id = 10;
UPDATE Users SET email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE WaterUsage SET gallons_used = 1500 WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe')
